list.abs: 色彩乐器组：钢琴(Piano)、竖琴(Harp)、木琴(Xylophone)、铝板钟琴(Aluminum glockenspiel)等。  由于交响乐队采用了这么多的乐器 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (denoting an organ stop imitating the sound of bells): from German Glockenspiel, literally 'bell play'

entry.def: A glockenspiel is a musical instrument which consists of metal bars of different lengths arranged like the keyboard of a piano. You play the glockenspiel by hitting the bars with wooden hammers.

means.word_mean: 1. a percussion instrument consisting of a set of graduated metal bars mounted on a frame and played with small hammers
